purpose: Control REIT metrics for distribution cut prediction model (Issue #37)

control_reits.extraction_notes: TTM AFFO payout ratio calculated as: (Monthly distribution $0.15417 Ã— 12 = $1.85) / (TTM AFFO per unit $2.17) = 85.3%. TTM AFFO per unit calculated from Q3 2024 ($0.61) + Q4 2024 ($0.47) + Q1 2025 ($0.54) + Q2 2025 ($0.55) = $2.17. Interest coverage ratio of 2.6x directly reported in Q2 2025 earnings. Debt/Assets ratio of 44.2% and Debt/EBITDA of 9.6x (adjusted) reported in Q2 2025 results. Occupancy rate improved to 98.6% (in-place and committed) in Q2 2025. Available liquidity of approximately $1.2 billion reported in Q2 2025 earnings call. SmartCentres is a control REIT (no distribution cut) with strong retail fundamentals - Canada's largest shopping center REIT with 197 properties, $12.0 billion in assets, and 35.6 million SF. 81.2% retail exposure, maintained distributions throughout COVID-19 demonstrating retail sector resilience. Payout ratio has improved from 90% TTM in Q3 2024 to 85.3% TTM as of Q2 2025, showing strengthening coverage.

control_reits.issuer_name: Dream Industrial Real Estate Investment Trust
control_reits.extraction_notes: Dream Industrial REIT reports FFO (Funds from Operations) as its primary operating metric, not AFFO (Adjusted Funds from Operations). Q2 2025 diluted FFO per unit was $0.26, up 4.1% YoY. Monthly distribution is $0.05833 per unit ($0.70 annualized). Calculated FFO payout ratio: $0.175 quarterly distribution / $0.26 FFO = 67.3%. Interest coverage ratio is strong at 5.1x (down slightly from 5.2x in Q4 2024). Debt metrics are conservative: 38% debt-to-assets (net of cash), 8.2x net debt-to-EBITDA. Occupancy is excellent at 96.0%, up 60 bps from Q1 2025. Available liquidity is $714.4M including $42.6M cash and substantial undrawn credit facilities. Pro forma subsequent $200M Series G debenture issuance, total liquidity exceeds $900M. Total assets: $8.3B as of June 30, 2025. This is a CONTROL REIT (no distribution cut) with strong industrial REIT fundamentals - high occupancy, conservative leverage, strong interest coverage, and healthy payout ratios well below 100%.

next_steps: Validate complete dataset (9 observations, no missing control metrics)
